name: nlopt
brief:
NLopt (Nonlinear Optimization) C API - bundled with oBB

NLopt is a library for nonlinear optimization providing a common
interface to many algorithms. This is a subset bundled with oBB.

**nlopt_algorithm Enum (in this subset):**
- NLOPT_LD_SLSQP: Sequential Least Squares Programming (local, derivative)

**nlopt_result Enum:**
- NLOPT_SUCCESS: Generic success
- NLOPT_STOPVAL_REACHED, FTOL_REACHED, XTOL_REACHED: Convergence
- NLOPT_MAXEVAL_REACHED, MAXTIME_REACHED: Limits hit
- NLOPT_FAILURE, INVALID_ARGS, OUT_OF_MEMORY: Errors

**Object-Oriented API:**
- nlopt_create(algorithm, n): Create optimizer for n dimensions
- nlopt_set_min/max_objective(): Set objective function
- nlopt_set_lower/upper_bounds(): Set variable bounds
- nlopt_add_inequality/equality_constraint(): Add constraints
- nlopt_set_ftol_rel/abs(), xtol_rel/abs(): Set tolerances
- nlopt_optimize(opt, x, &f): Run optimization
- nlopt_destroy(opt): Clean up

**Function Types:**
- nlopt_func: double f(n, x, grad, data) - objective/constraint
- nlopt_mfunc: void f(m, result, n, x, grad, data) - vector constraint
